TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlPersonalizationProvider extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider

summary.span: 实现一个使用 Microsoft SQL Server 的个性化设置提供程序。

span.span: Implements a personalization provider that uses Microsoft SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类定义使用 Microsoft SQL Server 的个性化设置提供程序所需的功能。This class defines the required functionality for a personalization provider using Microsoft SQL Server. 个性化设置提供程序代表 实例加载和存储个性化设置数据。A personalization provider both loads and stores personalization data on behalf of a instance. 此类实现从运行 SQL Server 的计算机进行读取和写入的逻辑，还实现 中定义的所有抽象方法。This class implements the logic for reading from and writing to computers running SQL Server, and also implements all the abstract methods defined in . 有关个性化设置提供程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on personalization providers, see . 使用 SQL Server 的 Web 部件个性化的数据设计依赖于是否存在两个常见的 SQL 数据库表及其支持的存储过程，它们对于大多数基于 SQL 的功能实现都是共享的。The data design for using Web Parts personalization with SQL Server relies on the existence of two common SQL database tables, and their supporting stored procedures, that are shared for most SQL-based feature implementations. 使用以下脚本安装和卸载这些表和视图：These tables and views are installed and uninstalled using the following scripts: - installpagepersonalization-安装个性化表、视图和相关的存储过程。installpagepersonalization.sql - Installs the personalization tables, views, and related stored procedures. - uninstallpagepersonalization-卸载个性化表、视图和相关的存储过程。uninstallpagepersonalization.sql - Uninstalls the personalization tables, views, and related stored procedures. 需要注意的是，如果您的 Web 应用程序不是以 或更高的默认信任级别运行（您可以使用 `` 元素在 web.config 文件中设置自定义信任级别），个性化设置将会失败。It is important to be aware that personalization will fail if your Web application does not run at the default trust level of or higher (you can set custom trust levels in a Web.config file using the `` element). 和 类都在初始化时检查 的信任级别。The and classes both check for a trust level of when they are initialized. 如果你将应用程序配置为在 的信任级别运行，并且你使用默认 提供程序来管理应用程序的个性化设置数据，则该应用程序第一次尝试访问个性化设置数据时将失败，因为在 信任中运行的 ASP.NET 工作进程没有调用 命名空间中的各种类所必需的权限。If you configure your application to run at a trust level of , and you use the default provider to manage the personalization data for your application, the first time that the application tries to access personalization data, it will fail because an ASP.NET worker process running in trust does not have the permissions necessary to call into the various classes in the namespace.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
Web Parts Personalization Overview

related.span: 演练：使用用户控件实现 Web 部件个性化设置

span.span: Walkthrough: Implementing Web Parts Personalization with a User Control
Web Parts Personalization

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数由 ASP.NET 调用，以创建在应用程序的配置中指定的 类的实例。The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 不应在代码中使用此构造函数。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

Public Overrides Property ApplicationName As String

summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其个性化设置信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application to store and retrieve personalization information for.

value.span: 要存储和检索其个性化设置信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application to store and retrieve personalization information for.

value.span: 默认值为当前 的 属性值。

span.span: The default is the property value for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用 属性对用户信息进行分组。The property is used by the class to group user information. 通过使用应用程序名称限定用户信息，你可以将多个应用程序的信息存储在单个数据库中，而不会在重复用户名之间发生冲突。By qualifying user information with an application name, you can store information for multiple applications in a single database without running into conflicts between duplicate user names. 另外，多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过在 属性中指定相同的值，来使用相同的用户数据库。Also, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以通过编程方式设置 属性，也可以在 Web 应用程序的配置文件中使用 `` 节中的 `applicationName` 属性以声明方式设置该属性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute in the `` section. 如果没有为 Web 应用程序的配置文件中的 `applicationName` 属性指定值，则将使用对应用程序发出的第一个请求的 属性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the property value for the first request made to the application is used. > [!CAUTION] > 由于单个默认个性化设置提供程序实例用于 对象提供的所有请求，因此可以同时执行多个请求，并尝试设置 属性值。Because a single default personalization provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性对于多个写入不是线程安全的，并且更改 属性值可能会导致应用程序的多个用户产生意外行为。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议你避免使用代码来允许用户设置 属性，除非需要。It is recommended that you avoid code to allow users to set the property unless required. 可能需要设置 属性的应用程序的一个示例是管理多个应用程序的个性化数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property might be required is an administrative application that manages personalization data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序，而不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.

exception.span: 此属性设置为一个长度大于 256 个字符的字符串。

span.span: The property was set to a string with a length greater than 256 characters.

summary.span: 根据指定范围和参数返回一个包含零个或零个以上 派生对象的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection containing zero or more -derived objects, based on the specified scope and parameters.

returns.span: ，包含零个或零个以上 派生对象。

span.span: A containing zero or more -derived objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回项的集合受 `pageSize` 和 `pageIndex` 参数的约束，其中 `pageSize` 控制要返回的记录数，并 `pageIndex` 控制要返回的记录。The set of returned items is constrained by the `pageSize` and `pageIndex` parameters, where `pageSize` controls the number of records to return and `pageIndex` controls which records to return. 例如，`pageIndex` 为0，`pageSize` 为25，则将返回前25个匹配项，而 `pageIndex` 为1，而 `pageSize` 为25，则返回发生26-50。For example, a `pageIndex` of 0 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return the first 25 occurrences, while a `pageIndex` of 1 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return occurrences 26-50. 如果要提取所有可用记录，请将 `pageIndex` 设置为0，并将 `pageSize` 设置为 。If you want to fetch all available records, set `pageIndex` to 0, and `pageSize` to . 按字母顺序返回 派生对象，按字母顺序按 和 排序。The -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order sorted by and , both in ascending order. 此方法将查询通配符传递到基础数据存储区。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 对通配符的支持当前依赖于每个提供程序如何处理星号（\*）、百分号（%）或下划线（_）等字符。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常，对于符合 SQL 标准的数据存储区，你可以在部分路径上执行通配符搜索，其中通配符字符出现在 属性中的搜索字符串文本的开头、末尾或中间。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以 "\~/approot" 开头的所有路径，则 属性将设置为 "\~/approot%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/approot", the property would be set to "\~/approot%". 同样，对部分用户名的通配符搜索可能会在 属性的文本字符串中的任意位置出现通配符字符。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找所有以 "John" 开头的用户名，则 参数将类似于 "John%"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 下面的查询约束适用：The following query constraints apply: - 如果只提供了 `scope`，并且 `query` `null` 或 `query` 返回 `null` 值或默认值，则返回与指定 `scope` 参数匹配的所有记录。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned. - 如果未 `null` 属性，还会根据与 属性值匹配的路径来筛选返回的记录。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the property value. - 如果未 `null` 属性，还会根据与 属性值匹配的用户名来筛选返回的记录。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果 属性不等于 ，则返回的记录也将进行筛选，以仅返回与非活动用户关联的那些记录。If the property is not equal to , then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比较包含 属性小于或等于 属性的记录。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 请注意，此方法不会验证查询参数的组合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 例如，代码可以请求一组与共享作用域中的特定用户名相关联的个性化设置状态记录。For example, code can request a set of personalization state records associated with a specific user name in the shared scope. 由于用户名不与共享信息关联，因此返回的集合将为空。Because user names are not associated with shared information, the returned collection would be empty. 有可能返回非空集合的参数组合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - 作用域与 组合。 scope in combination with . - 范围与任意或全部 、和 属性的值相结合。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将查询通配符传递到基础数据存储区。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 对通配符的支持当前依赖于每个提供程序如何处理星号（\*）、百分号（%）或下划线（_）等字符。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常，对于符合 SQL 标准的数据存储区，你可以在部分路径上执行通配符搜索，其中通配符字符出现在 属性中的搜索字符串文本的开头、末尾或中间。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以 "\~/approot" 开头的所有路径，则 属性将设置为 "\~/approot%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/approot", the property would be set to "\~/approot%". 同样，对部分用户名的通配符搜索可能会在 属性的文本字符串中的任意位置出现通配符字符。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找所有以 "John" 开头的用户名，则 参数将类似于 "John%"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 下面的查询约束适用：The following query constraints apply: - 如果只提供了 `scope`，并且 `query` `null` 或 `query` 返回 `null` 值或默认值，则返回与指定 `scope` 参数匹配的所有记录。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned. - 如果未 `null` 属性，还会根据与 属性值匹配的路径来筛选返回的记录。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the property value. - 如果未 `null`，则还会根据与 属性值匹配的用户名来筛选返回的记录。If the is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果 属性不等于 ，则返回的记录也将进行筛选，以仅返回与非活动用户关联的那些记录。If the property is not equal to , then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比较包含 属性小于或等于 属性的记录。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 请注意，此方法不会验证查询参数的组合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 例如，代码可以在共享范围内请求与非活动用户关联的状态记录计数。For example, code can request a count of state records associated with inactive users in the shared scope. 由于不存在非活动自定义的概念，因此返回的计数将为零。Because there is no concept of inactive customizations, the returned count would be zero. 有可能返回非空集合的参数组合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - 作用域与 组合。 scope in combination with . - 范围与任意或全部 、和 属性的值相结合。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了用于将个性化设置用于 SQL 数据库的初始化过程，但不应在代码中直接使用。This method provides the initialization procedures for using personalization with a SQL database and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

param.span: 为 范围返回的数据。

span.span: The returned data for the scope.

summary.span: 根据指定参数从基础数据存储区加载个性化设置数据。

span.span: Loads personalization data from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用 `webPartManager`、`path`和 `username` 参数作为检索键。This method uses the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `username` parameters as retrieval keys. 返回的数据包含：The returned data contains: - 在 `sharedDataBlob` 参数中返回的数据。The data returned in the `sharedDataBlob` parameter. - 根据键值，将在 `userDataBlob` 参数中返回 数据。Depending on the key values, data is returned in the `userDataBlob` parameter. `userName` 参数的非`null` 值指示还将检索 数据。A non-`null` value for the `userName` parameter indicates that data is also retrieved. 每次从页面请求上下文中的数据库加载特定于用户的个性化设置数据时， 对象都会自动更新 `aspnet_Users` 表中的 列。The object automatically updates the column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is loaded from the database in the context of a page request. 此行为允许其他 ASP.NET 功能在管理陈旧数据记录时使用 属性，并确定站点上最近的用户活动。This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the property when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.

override this.ResetPersonalizationBlob : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager * string * string -> unit

summary.span: 从基础数据存储区中删除个性化设置数据。

span.span: Deletes personalization data from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当网站用户选择重置页面上的 Web 部件数据时， 使用此方法从数据库中删除个性化设置数据。 uses this method to delete personalization data from the database when a Web site user chooses to reset Web Parts data on a page. 如果 `username` 不是`null`，则会删除具有 范围数据的数据;否则，会删除具有 作用域的数据。If `username` is non-`null`, data with the scope data is deleted; otherwise, data with the scope is deleted. 每次从页面请求上下文中的数据库中删除用户特定的个性化数据时， 对象都会自动更新 `aspnet_Users` 表中的 列。The object automatically updates the column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is deleted from the database in the context of a page request. 此行为允许其他 ASP.NET 功能在管理陈旧数据记录时使用 值，并确定站点上最近的用户活动。This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the value when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持通配符。No wildcard characters are supported by this method. 仅允许以下参数组合：Only the following combinations of parameters are allowed: - 设置 `scope` 参数，并将所有其他参数设置为 `null`。The `scope` parameter is set, and all other parameters are set to `null`. 此组合将删除与 `scope`指示的个性化设置范围关联的所有 Web 部件的个性化设置数据。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data associated with the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope` 参数设置为，并且 `paths` 参数至少包含一个值。The `scope` parameter is set, and the `paths` parameter contains at least one value. 此组合将删除 `scope`所指示的个性化设置范围中的指定路径 Web 部件的所有个性化设置数据。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data for the specified path or paths that are in the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope` 参数设置为 ，`paths` 参数已设置并且只包含一个路径，并且 `usernames` 参数至少包含一个值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is set and contains only one path, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 此组合将删除与 `usernames`中包含的用户或用户关联的给定路径的所有用户个性化 Web 部件数据。This combination deletes all user personalization Web Parts data for the given path that is associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. - `scope` 参数设置为 ，`paths` 参数 `null`，并且 `usernames` 参数至少包含一个值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is `null`, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 此组合将删除与 `usernames`中包含的用户或用户关联的所有路径中每个用户的每用户个性化设置 Web 部件数据。This combination deletes all per-user personalization Web Parts data, across all paths, associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. 参数值的任何其他组合都无效，将引发 异常。Any other combination of parameter values is invalid and will throw an exception. 例如，不允许使用以下两种组合：For example, the following two combinations are not allowed: - 当 `scope` 参数设置为 时，无法提供 `usernames` 参数。The `usernames` parameter cannot be provided when the `scope` parameter is set to . - 当 `usernames` 参数不 `null`时，`paths` 参数不能包含多个条目。The `paths` parameter cannot contain more than one entry when the `usernames` parameter is not `null`. 各个数组中包含的 `paths` 和 `usernames` 参数必须满足下列验证规则。The `paths` and `usernames` parameters contained within the respective arrays must meet the following validation rules. 如果任何参数数组成员的任何验证规则都失败，则会引发 异常。If any validation rules fail for any member of the parameter arrays, an exception is thrown. 验证规则包括：The validation rules include: - 不允许使用 `null` 值。`null` values are not allowed. - 在截断字符串后，不允许使用空字符串（""）。An empty string ("") after the string has been trimmed is not allowed. - `usernames` 参数中包含的用户名不能包含逗号。No user names contained in the `usernames` parameter can contain commas. - `paths` 参数中任何路径的长度不能超过256个字符。The length of any path in the `paths` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters. - `usernames` 参数中的任何用户名的长度不能超过256个字符。The length of any user name in the `usernames` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters.

exception.span: 或 参数为空数组。

span.span: Either the or the parameter is an empty array.
-or-

exception.span: 包含在各自数组中的 和 参数不满足有效性规则。

span.span: The and parameters contained within the respective arrays do not meet the validation rules.

exception.span: 指定的 不是 枚举的成员。

span.span: The specified is not a member of the enumeration.

param.span: 指示最后一次活动的日期。

span.span: The date indicating the last activity.

summary.span: 根据指定参数从基础数据存储区删除用户个性化设置数据。

span.span: Deletes user personalization data from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.

returns.span: 从基础数据存储区中删除的行数。

span.span: The count of rows deleted from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的参数具有以下限制：This method's parameters have the following restrictions: - `path` 参数不能包含通配符。The `path` parameter cannot contain wildcard characters. - 如果 `path` 参数不是`null`，则将仅删除与 `path` 关联的每用户个性化设置记录。If the `path` parameter is non-`null`, then only per-user personalization records associated with `path` will be deleted. - 由于在 `userInactiveSinceDate` 参数指定的日期后，将仅删除与被视为非活动状态的用户关联的每用户个性化记录。Only per-user personalization records associated with users that are considered inactive since the date specified in the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter will be deleted. 确切的比较是删除 属性小于或等于 `userInactiveSinceDate` 参数的记录。The exact comparison would be to delete records where the property is less than or equal to the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter. - 如果同时提供了这两个参数，则将删除匹配这两个约束的记录。If both parameters are provided, then records that match both constraints are deleted. - `path` 参数可以 `null`。The `path` parameter can be `null`. - 修整后，`path` 参数不能为空字符串。The `path` parameter cannot be an empty string after trimming. - 属性不能为 `null`。The property cannot be `null`.

exception.span: 是一个空字符串。

span.span: is an empty string.
-or-

exception.span: 该路径的长度大于 256 个字符。

span.span: The path is greater than 256 characters in length.

summary.span: 将原始个性化设置数据保存到基础 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中。

span.span: Saves raw personalization data to the underlying Microsoft SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供了一个非`null` 的用户名，则 `dataBlob` 参数包含 范围的个性化设置数据;否则，假定 `dataBlob` 包含 作用域的数据。If a non-`null` user name is provided, then the `dataBlob` parameter contains personalization data for scope; otherwise, `dataBlob` is assumed to contain data for scope. 每次将特定于用户的个性化设置数据保存到页面请求上下文中的数据库时， 对象将自动更新 `aspnet_Users` 表中的 列。The object automatically updates the column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is saved to the database in the context of a page request. 此行为允许其他 ASP.NET 功能在管理陈旧数据记录时使用 属性，并确定站点上最近的用户活动。This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the property when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.
